DEMO_804_MSG_010:
̅Why, if it isn't ȁ! To what do I owe
this pleasure to you and your lady friend today?
DEMO_804_MSG_020:
̂It's been quite some time, Your Majesty!
You're looking as large and in charge as ever.
DEMO_804_MSG_100: ̂It isn't for myself... it's for him, and Lenate.
DEMO_804_MSG_030:
̅What a rude exchange for an initial meeting!
Erm... this is our first meeting, is it not!?
DEMO_804_MSG_110: ̅Hmm... seeing all that ȁ has done for us, I simply must oblige. Do as you wish!
DEMO_804_MSG_040:
̂Oh, right... this is your first time seeing me in this form.
I am Aroma... apprentice of the great Dr. Lucia!
DEMO_804_MSG_120: ̂You hear that, ȁ? Let's take the elevator down to the basement right away!
DEMO_804_MSG_050:
̅My goodness, she had an apprentice!? I don't recall
ever seeing her with anyone else, however...
DEMO_804_MSG_060:
̂Well, it's a long story... rest assured, we've met before
your majesty.
ā
DEMO_804_MSG_070:
̂Aside from all that... I've come here to ask a favor
of you, your majesty.
ā
DEMO_804_MSG_080:
̂I'm requesting that I be granted access to the Disc Machine,
on the first basement level.
DEMO_804_MSG_090:
̅Hmm, access to the Disc Machine, you say?
I don't mind, however... could explain why?
